clinical_study.brief_title: Prediction of Pain During Old People Care Measured by Skin Conductance
clinical_study.official_title: Prediction of Pain During Old People Care Measured by Skin Conductance

brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of the project is to validate the use of Pain Monitor™ device, not invasive and simple of employment, for old people able to answer to a digital scale of pain intensity.
The main objective is to develop and to validate a model of prediction of the pain in old subject at the time of the care, using the measure of variation of the skin conductance.

primary_outcome.measure: Correlation between Number of pics of skin conductance per second measured by Pain Monitor™ device with Numerical visual scale score for pain

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of efficient poses of Pain Monitor
Percentage of patient refusal to use of the Pain monitor
